en-US.summary: Use Corny Dad to hear a random, corny joke, your father would say.
examplePhrases: Alexa, ask Corny Dad to tell me a joke.
Alexa, ask Corny Dad to tell me a corny joke.
en-US.name: Corny Dad
en-US.description: Use Corny Dad to hear a random, corny joke, your father would say. Try it out, it's father approved!Corny Dad has no special requirements, simply enable corny dad and enjoy!
